description: Enterprise techniques used by RARSTONE, ATT&CK software S0055 v1.1
name: RARSTONE (S0055)

techniques.comment: [RARSTONE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0055) obtains installer properties from Uninstall Registry Key entries to obtain information about installed applications and how to uninstall certain applications.(Citation: Camba RARSTONE)
[RARSTONE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0055) downloads its backdoor component from a C2 server and loads it directly into memory.(Citation: Aquino RARSTONE)
[RARSTONE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0055) uses SSL to encrypt its communication with its C2 server.(Citation: Aquino RARSTONE)

After decrypting itself in memory, [RARSTONE](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0055) downloads a DLL file from its C2 server and loads it in the memory space of a hidden Internet Explorer process. This “downloaded” file is actually not dropped onto the system.(Citation: Camba RARSTONE)
